svg.title: Complete Underwriting Workflow — 18 Phases
svg.desc: Full underwriting journey showing all phases from Operator Context Brief through Closing, aligned to the Workflow Orchestrator v1.3. Includes blocking gates, conditional branches, half-steps, skill counts, time estimates, and segment brackets.
svg.text: ORCHESTRATOR v1.3 — OPERATOR CONTEXT BRIEF THROUGH CLOSING

g.text: Planning, deal parameters, nuance classification, scope
Scan, classify, DD checklist, Deal Book (XLSX) creation
GATE — if NO-GO, workflow stops | 30+ page DOCX
MCP data services — SOFR, Census, BLS, FEMA, HUD, Walk Score
MSA data, supply pipeline, demand drivers, submarket | 30+ page DOCX
Rent comps, sales comps, value synthesis, broker variance | 30+ page DOCX
CRITICAL GATE — derive lender rents independently, not broker’s
Conditional — affordable, rent control, tax abatement, ground lease
5A Revenue: rent roll, unit mix, vacancy | 5B Expense: T-12 line items, benchmarks
T-12 & Cash Flow Underwriting — Dual Scenario
GATE — NOI must reconcile before sizing | Sponsor PF + Lender UW
Conditional — value-add / lease-up renovation & capex assessment; stabilized → skip
Appraisal, PCA, Phase I ESA, site visit, valuation reconciliation
LTV, DSCR 1.05x, DY, LTC, max loan — min governs
Rate, term, IO period, reserves, covenants, extensions, capital stack
Stress tests, sensitivity tables, risk rating, levered/unlevered returns
20+ page capstone memo referencing all 7 prior documents
Conditional — term sheets, commitment letters, pricing quotes
DD package, third-party reports, settlement, funding authorization
● GATE (blocking) ○ Conditional (dashed) ● Half-step ● Standard flow Total: 143 skills across 18 phases + 3 conditional
